sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, as well as information that is automatically collected, such as your IP address.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, as well as to protect ourselves and our users.

sections.heading: Sharing of Information
sections.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this Privacy Policy.

sections.heading: Your Choices
sections.content: You may update, correct, or delete information about you at any time by logging into your account or contacting us.
